honors_and_awards.title: ISB Torchbearer Award
honors_and_awards.description: ISB Torchbearer awards are given to students who have made immense contributions to the School. The criterion for the award include - importance of the initiative/activity by the student from ISB's perspective, the number of activities the student is involved in, the quality of implementation (teamwork, communication to different stakeholders), outcomes (such as sustained improvements and contribution to brand ISB), and demonstration of leadership (vision, mobilisation of energy/ideas… Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Winner–‘Turn the Tide’, a ‘leadership speech’ competition
honors_and_awards.description: Henry Ford II, after having fired legendary Lee Iacocca, and recently resigning from CEO's chair, has to convince his shareholders that he is still the one, Ford needs.

honors_and_awards.title: Winner - Unilever Unplugged Case Competition 2015
honors_and_awards.description: Developed key marketing insight for an entry level water purifier and proposed integrated marketing campaign
